name: Codycave Social Icon
author: Codycave

sections.description:
Codycave Social Icon is a plugin that helps you to add your social links with some awesome icons. It is versy simple yet pretty plugin. What you have to do is just use our simplest shortcodes and you will get some cool icons in your website. You can add it in your page, widget or in your theme.

Major Features:
1. Simple Shortcode
2. Five Awesome Style
3. Seven Cool Color Variations
4. Widget Support
5. Theme Integration Support

Plugin Demo : http://www.codycave.com/Plugins/social-icon/
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload Codycave Social Icon folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can use shortcode in page, post or widgets.
  4. If you want to use it in your theme’s tempalte then place <?php echo do_shortcode('YOUR_SHORTCODE'); ?> in your templates.

Shortcode Lists:

Square Icon

[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_red"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_green"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_sky"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_yellow"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_orange"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_feroza"]

Social Icon Square (Background on Hover)

[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_red"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_green"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_sky"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_yellow"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_orange"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_square_noBG_feroza"]

Rounded Icon

[codycave_fa name="wordpress"  url="http://wordpress.com" ]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_round_red"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_round_green"]
[codycave_fa name="wordpress" url="http://wordpress.com" style="codycave_round_sky"]

No Border Icon

Social Icon with Border Radius Background
